name: Charge (itch) (Suhad)
description:
Charge is a short, action, push-forward, Fast-based, first-person combat shooter game, inspired by Doom.

You will join Sergeant Kane to explore and discover what happened while fighting creatures in your way through the space station.

Please know that  I have created this game around 2 years ago and now I just finished somethings that I have left and decided to to put it here for free, and now I am focused on creating games with Survival Horror genera presented by my game studio Nexuss Essence.

Key Features:

  • Attack with speed.
  • For fans of push-forward, Fast-based, action combats.
  • Inspired by Doom. 
  • Fast and fluid movement.
  • Short game (20 min - 30 min) and intense.
  • Auto save system.
  • Featuring Awesome soundtrack.
  • Made by a solo developer.
